control_objective: Management direction for information security shall be established
implementation_guidance: Develop and maintain information security policies approved by management

control_name: Review of the policies for information security
control_objective: Policies shall be reviewed at planned intervals
implementation_guidance: Review policies at least annually or when significant changes occur

control_objective: Management shall support security through clear direction and commitment
implementation_guidance: Establish roles and responsibilities for information security

control_objective: Security shall address mobile computing and teleworking
implementation_guidance: Implement mobile device management and secure remote access

control_objective: Background verification checks on candidates shall be carried out
implementation_guidance: Conduct background checks proportional to risk assessment

control_objective: Employees shall be aware of information security responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Provide security awareness training and enforce acceptable use

control_objective: Security responsibilities that remain valid after termination shall be defined
implementation_guidance: Define post-employment confidentiality obligations

control_objective: Assets shall be identified and inventory maintained
implementation_guidance: Maintain asset inventory with ownership assigned

control_objective: Information shall be classified in terms of legal requirements and value
implementation_guidance: Implement data classification scheme aligned with business needs

control_objective: Procedures for handling of removable media shall be implemented
implementation_guidance: Control physical media through labeling disposal and transport procedures

control_objective: Access control policy shall be established based on business requirements
implementation_guidance: Define and document access control requirements

control_objective: Formal user registration and de-registration process shall be implemented
implementation_guidance: Implement identity lifecycle management processes

control_objective: Users shall be required to follow practices in the use of authentication
implementation_guidance: Enforce strong authentication and account protection

control_objective: Access to systems and applications shall be controlled
implementation_guidance: Implement logical access controls and session management

control_objective: Policy on the use of cryptographic controls shall be developed
implementation_guidance: Define cryptographic standards for data protection

control_objective: Physical security perimeters shall be defined and used
implementation_guidance: Implement physical access controls and perimeter security

control_objective: Equipment shall be protected to reduce threats from environmental hazards
implementation_guidance: Protect equipment from environmental threats and unauthorized access

control_objective: Operating procedures shall be documented and made available
implementation_guidance: Document and maintain operational procedures

control_objective: Detection prevention and recovery controls shall be implemented
implementation_guidance: Deploy anti-malware controls across all systems

control_objective: Backup copies of information and software shall be taken and tested
implementation_guidance: Implement backup procedures with regular testing

control_objective: Event logs shall be produced and regularly reviewed
implementation_guidance: Implement centralized logging and security monitoring

control_objective: Procedures shall be implemented to control installation of software
implementation_guidance: Control software installation through change management

control_objective: Information about technical vulnerabilities shall be obtained and evaluated
implementation_guidance: Implement vulnerability management program

control_objective: Audit requirements shall be carefully planned
implementation_guidance: Plan system audits to minimize business impact

control_objective: Networks shall be managed and controlled to protect information
implementation_guidance: Implement network segmentation and security controls

control_objective: Policies and procedures shall protect information in transit
implementation_guidance: Secure information transfer through encryption and controls

control_objective: Security requirements shall be included in requirements for new systems
implementation_guidance: Include security requirements in system specifications

control_name: Security in development and support processes
control_objective: Secure development policy shall be established
implementation_guidance: Implement secure SDLC practices

control_objective: Test data shall be selected carefully and protected
implementation_guidance: Use sanitized or synthetic test data

control_objective: Information security requirements for mitigating risks shall be agreed
implementation_guidance: Assess and manage supplier security risks

control_objective: Supplier service delivery shall be monitored reviewed and audited
implementation_guidance: Monitor supplier security performance

control_name: Management of information security incidents and improvements
control_objective: Consistent and effective approach to management of incidents shall be implemented
implementation_guidance: Establish incident response procedures

control_domain: Information security aspects of business continuity management
control_objective: Information security continuity shall be embedded in BCM systems
implementation_guidance: Include security in business continuity planning

control_domain: Information security aspects of business continuity management
control_objective: Information processing facilities shall be implemented with redundancy
implementation_guidance: Implement redundancy for critical systems

control_name: Compliance with legal and contractual requirements
control_objective: All relevant requirements shall be identified and documented
implementation_guidance: Identify and document legal and regulatory requirements

control_objective: Independent review of information security shall be conducted
implementation_guidance: Conduct periodic security assessments and audits
